name: isosorbide
source: Bergstrom C. A. S.; Norinder U.; Luthman K.; Artursson P. Molecular Descriptors Influencing Melting Point and Their Role in Classification of Solid Drugs. J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci.; (Article); 2003; 43(4); 1177-1398
Reason: 1,2-propanediol base, with a melting point around 50 degrees Celsius, based on the fact that 1,2-propanediol itself has a melting point around that value. The methoxy group introduces additional rigidity, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius. The isopropyl group introduces additional molecular weight, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius. The dioxane-like bridging moiety introduces rigidity and likely contributes more significantly than a simple ether, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius for this structural feature.
